inclusion.criterion: Be 45 years of age or older
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Be a Tis, T1, N0 M0 - American Joint Committee Classification
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Have negative surgical margins (NSABP definition) after final surgery
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Should have adequate skin spacing between balloon surface and surface of the skin
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Have extensive intraductal component (Harvard Definition,>25% DCIS)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 35-year-old woman with myasthenia gravis, class IIa. She complains of diplopia and fatigue and weakness that affects mainly her upper limbs.
